name: ULTIMATE MIDSOMMAR SIMULATOR
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2021

- The Join theme is displayed as the typical swedish Midsommar dance where people dance forming rings.

This is like the classic Snake game but with a twist.

people can be joined in queues for later be arranged as circles.

The objective is to arrange as many people as possible before people from different queues or circles collide with each other. Score will be calculated only from the arranged circles, queues only work to group people before arranging circles.

Controls:

You only need to use left click, space bar and Escape key to exit.

clicking on a person will highlight it, you can click another person to join them in a queue. 

Queues have a head (red person) and a back (blue person) you can join people to an existing queue by selecting a person and then the back person from the desired queue. 

you can split queues by clicking in a person on a queue and joining it to another queue or person.

Queues will not stop moving so you will need to drag the head of the queue (red person) to change the queue path.

You can also drag a person on a queue to split an existing queue.

In order to arrange a ring you need to select a head and a back from the same queue.

SPACE BAR is used to stop/play the music, stopping the music will pause the game so you can plan actions.

ENJOY MIDSOMMAR :)
